attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
allow me 2 present some evidence on how bad ej's driving is

1. he confused motorways with microwaves saying "hahaa yehh i meant a motorwayy!!! same thing."

2. he has crashed 3 or 4 times

3. he stalled 8 times at a junction

4. a formal complaint was made about his driving to the school after nearly running someone down on mottingham lane

5. he thinks the past tense of skid is "skud"

6. he broke a red traffic light last night-and openly admits to it

7. he cannot see over the steering wheel

8. he says that "its ok insurance will pay for a new car if i wreck it"-he forgets the cost of human life

9. he said "id b more sad if i failed the test that if i killed sum1 on the test"

10. he paid his examiner to let him pass

11. he failed his first test, then lied to everyone about it claiming "blue engine coolant" even though it is red

moreover it his general disregard for the safety of him and others which makes me request the revocation of his driving license
